lessons_learned: Configuration-first validation: Check analytics configuration before running validation to avoid false negatives

Environment variable management: Merge functionality is critical to preserve existing structure and comments
SSOT compliance: Systematic validation ensures consistency across analytics domain tools
Devlog standards: Mandatory 'Next Steps' section enables effective human-in-the-loop coordination
